0.1.name: wordpress/cite-this
0.1.description:
Nowadays, more and more bloggers write informative articles. By this plugin, those articles could be referred to in a formal citation.

Features

  • Full custom citation styles.
  • Three modes to provide citation texts.
    1. Append after article.
    2. A link to a static page or loading dynamically.
    3. Open in new window.
  • Different modes in single post or multi-post loop.
  • Widget support.
  • Plugin options page.
  • Complete deactivation.

Demonstration

Please check this demo blog post out.

Get Support

Please ask your questions in this forum.

Help Development

Please submit bug report, request feature or visit this plugin's website at here<
